name: Additional Interpretation Codes
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG
description: This extension is used when there are multiple interpretation values for a single Observation Resource.  The first interpretation for this observation is the interpretation element and any additional interpretations for this observation will go here.

element.formal: This extension is used when there are multiple interpretation values for a single Observation Resource.  The first interpretation for this observation is the interpretation element and any additional interpretations for this observation will go here.
